sections.title: Details
content: It is a Solo Photography Competition.

sections.title: Structure
content: The competition will be conducted and judged completely online, no live presence will be required for this competition.
Participants will submit their photographs via the official Impressions website or through the drive link which will be provided on Whatsapp of the participant after the registration.

sections.title: Rules and Guidelines
content: The competition is open to all college students. If participant is found out of college, he/she/they will not be eligible for the judgement of their artwork.
Photography can be done using any device available (Mobile phone, DSLR or point-and-shoot).
Usage of filters or editing software or plagiarism will result in disqualification.
The photo must be of a standard aspect ratio (1:1, 1:2, 3:4, 9:16) with no more than 2048 pixels on the longer side.
Vulgarity and obscenity at any point are strictly not allowed.

By submitting their artwork, the participants declare that their artwork is original and that they are the sole creators of the artwork. A provision will be made on the submission link to sign a declaration ensuring the same.
The sole copyright of the artwork remains with the creators, but Impressions has the right of promoting the content on social media platforms and other print media.
Image Submission Rule:
Images should be submitted in JPEG/JPG/PNG format.
Photos must be named “Lensart_ParticipantName”.
Image size should not exceed 10MB.
If the submission is via Drive link, Folder should be uploaded to your personal Google Drive. Access permission must be given to “Anyone with a link can view/edit”.
The link to your Personal Google Drive should be uploaded to the form shared to you on Whatsapp. The Access permission should be given as stated above.
Photo editing and the use of filters are strictly prohibited.
Photos submitted should be clearly visible for judging.
The artwork provided should not have any glass frames.
Submissions for multiple themes shall require multiple registrations.

sections.title: Details
content: It is an offline reel making competition.

sections.title: Structure
content: Team Size: 1-3 Members
The competition will be conducted throughout the 3 days of Impressions, live presence of participant is required on day of shooting.
Participants will submit their Reels via the official Impressions website or through the drive link which will be provided on Whatsapp of the participant after registration.
Results will be declared after the fest.

sections.title: Rules and Guidelines
content: This competition is strictly for the students of COEP Technological University.
All the contacting about the event and the communication will be done via Whatsapp with Team Leaders only.
The content for the video can be shot using any device. Eg. Mobile phone, DSLR, etc.
Plagiarism will result in disqualification.
Vulgarity and obscenity will result in disqualification.
Participants can shoot their reel on any or all of the fest days.
All the content in the reels including the clips should be original and that the participants should be their sole creators. A declaration will be required during submission.
Content can be shot in any arena without disturbing ongoing competitions. Inclusion of participants can only be done with their consent.
The Team Name should be that of the Team Leader.
Reel Submission Guidelines:
The video submitted should be less than 1.5 minutes
Video Format: MP4, MKV.
The aspect ratio of the reels should be 9:16 or 16:9
Name of the Video: ‘Reelscape_TeamLeaderName’
Submitted reel should be clear enough for judging.
Reel size should be less than 150MB.

The reels should be submitted in a folder. The folder should also contain a document(pdf or word document) specifying the technology used( like softwares used, camera, etc.). The pdf may also contain a small description explaining the theme or concept behind the reel.
Name of the folder: ‘Reelscape_TeamLeaderName
Name of the document: ‘Reelscape_TeamLeaderName’
Only one reel per team should be uploaded. Submission of more than one reel will result in disqualification.
